oracle.pg.rdbms.index.lucene

Class RDBMSLuceneIndexParameters

  • java.lang.Object
    • oracle.pg.text.OracleIndexParameters
      • oracle.pg.text.lucene.LuceneIndexParameters
        • oracle.pg.rdbms.index.lucene.RDBMSLuceneIndexParameters

  • public class RDBMSLuceneIndexParameters
extends LuceneIndexParameters
    This class manages relevant parameters for text indexing
